name: The Source of Evil
description: The source of evil - Hush-Hush Mission is a FPS adventure virtual reality game. Players are expected to have a ferocious fight with the mutated creatures in the abandoned underground lab.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970,AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
